descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/2hTSAYo.png[/img][/center]

[b].: Body Types Supported :.[/b]
CBBE HDT (requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDTPE[/url])

[b].: Description :.[/b]
This mod adds a set of army themed fatigues to the Skyrim along with a WIP pair of aviator sun glasses. I would say that this mod is 90% complete.
I still want to add a pair of army boots and gloves to the outfit but as of now, the mod only includes the jacket, pants, & shirt.
.:Note:. The glasses might not fit everyone's face because everyone has a different face.

[b].: Installation :.[/b]
Simply install with a mod manager.
You the console command to add files "~" then type help army and help shades to find the IDs of the items.
Add files with the console command "player.additem"

[b].: Some of the main mods used in screenshots :.[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?] RealVision ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?] Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]
HDT Physics Extensions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?] Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57179/?] Female Hairstyles with Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61670/?] The Oasis[/url]

[b].: Credits :.[/b]
Caliente - for the CBBE body
HDT Physics Extensions - for the bounce
author: Monno
